anathema: Cower from fights, allow yourself to be resurrected instead of reincarnated
edict: Commit acts of brutal violence, test yourself against nature, make animals more dangerous
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Angazhan (The Ravenous King)](/Deities.aspx?ID=644)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=237) pg. 8

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Demon Lords](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=5)

**Edicts** Commit acts of brutal violence, test yourself against nature, make animals more dangerous

**Anathema** Cower from fights, allow yourself to be resurrected instead of reincarnated

**Area of Concern**
Apes, jungles, tyrants

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Constitution

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Sanctification** none

**Divine Skill** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36)

**Favored Weapon** [Fist](/Weapons.aspx?ID=356) or [Spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=365)

**Domains** [Destruction](/Domains.aspx?ID=71), [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=83), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=85), [Tyranny](/Domains.aspx?ID=96)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Indulgence](/Domains.aspx?ID=79), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=100)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Sure Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=1709)

- **2nd**
[Animal Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=1440)
(ape only)

- **5th**
[Moon Frenzy](/Spells.aspx?ID=1609)

</column>
name: Angazhan (The Ravenous King)
